description: The Guides Down Vest is a classic winter puffy vest that can hang from the backyard to the backcountry. This super packable down vest is a must-have in your cold weather layering kit with technical features and cozy comfort that makes it a perfect fit on and off the mountain. This sleeveless puffer lives for freezing bluebird days when you want your arms free with enough puff to keep you warm shucking oysters at the backyard roast and breathable enough for winter hikes or chasing the kids and the dog at the park. No party fouls for spilled beers here, Down Defender ensures you can go full speed ahead when the fun gets a little wet on the hill or after hours.
name: Marmot Guides Down Vest - Mens
